titles.title: Come Let Us Worship And Bow Down

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come let us worship and bow down.
Let us kneel before the Lord our God, our Maker. (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For He is our God,
And we are the people of His pasture,
And the sheep of His hand,
And the sheep of His hand.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Venid, adoremos y postremonos.
Arrodillemonos delante del Se√±or,
Nuestro Salvador

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Por que el es nuestro Dios
Y nosotros el pueblo de Su prado,
Y ovejas de Su mano,
Y ovejas de Su mano.
